dialog.title: Are you sure you want to add this content to the broadcast?
dialog.description: Once you add the content to the broadcast, it will be visible and accessible to viewers.

dialog.title: Are you sure you want to remove this content?
dialog.description: When you remove the content, this audio will not be available to viewers.

dialog.title: Are you sure you want to test this audio?
dialog.description: This audio will be sent for testing when the test starts.

dialog.title: Are you sure you want to delete this audio?
dialog.description: When you delete an audio, it will not affect broadcasters using it, but it will be removed from the audio library.

index.add: {title} was successfully added to the broadcast.
index.remove: {title} was successfully removed from the broadcast.

test.error: An error occurred while testing the audio.

delete.error: An error occurred while deleting the audio.
